text: 5:18 Matyu 26:4; Jon 7:1; 7:19; 7:30; 10:30; 10:33; Filipai 2:6Ezɨ Judaba me akar kam baregha me fo, Iesus Sabatɨn dughiamɨn Arazimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ, egha a uaghan ghaze, God guizbangɨra nan Afeziamra. Akar kamɨn, a uabɨ uabɨ gamigha egha Godɨn mɨn oto. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Judaba Iesus mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa me bar ifonge.
